nodes.text: Wedding of Jagged Fel and Jaina Solo

During the return of the Lost Tribe of Sith, Imperial Head of State Jagged Fel proposed marriage to the Jedi Knight Jaina Solo. Following the liberation of Coruscant and the death of the dark side entity Abeloth, Solo was promoted to Jedi Master and Fel handed over the Head of State position to Vitor Reige. Several weeks later, Solo and Fel were married aboard the Hapan Battle Dragon Dragon Queen II.

Jaina Solo and Jagged Fel's marriage appeared in the 2012 novel Fate of the Jedi: Apocalypse, the final book in the Fate of the Jedi series. The marriage itself was not seen, as the novel ended right as Solo walked down the aisle.
